value:
Ah, friend of this force! Your order
needs Heroes to face a grave threat.
Well, Odin Dark is up to the task!

I serve Leo! Lord of Nohr. Prince of
darkness. Man of umbral moods.
(And a pretty awesome guy!)

You, who purifies evil! Who purges
malevolence! Slumber if you tire.
(Basically, take breaks, OK?)

This place! Oh, its forbidden rooms!
Legendary weapons! Wondrous things!
(Tons of stuff. So exciting!)

I specialize in probing beyond the
ordinary words for weapons to find
their true names of power!$k$pMissiletainn is the greatest such name
I have ever known. I will give thought
to what your weapon's true name is.

A friend of yours sent me with a
missive of massive import. Now,
$Nf says...$k$pHi.

Yes! My true power awakens
further!

My hidden potential hides less
and less each day!

What?! Has some foul influence
leeched my growing power?

Oh, architect of my excellence!
(Thanks for the bump, buddy!)

I am Odin Dark. Mage of Nohr!
Twilight traveler! Infinite enigma!
(And, hey, all-around nice guy.)

Ha! My third eye told me you
would appear in this holy shrine
to heroism and warfare.$k$pI would speak with the anointed
champion, plucked by fate from—
Wait, come back! Don't leave!$k$pI just wanted to say I knew I'd run
into you if I waited here. I actually
need to talk with you.$k$pI feel like we've gotten real close,
and I don't want to keep secrets
from you.$k$pI must therefore reveal that I am
NOT Odin at all but a warrior of
hope from another time...Owain!$k$pYeah, yeah, enough with the
theatrics... But let me tell you this:
I have not and will not lie to you.
でやっ！
くらえ！
ぐあっ！
Not so bad...!
You can't hide from me!
Eldritch Smackdown!
Power...overflowing!
Overdoing it—as usual!
So...dark.
Heh
Odin will always do his darkest to assist you.
You have my infinite gratitude for watching over me.
Hey! You should have some big lines to say when summoning! I'll think some up for you!
Summoner? Order of Heroes? You bask in the light of some powerful words, friend!
Odin Dark never fathomed that he would find himself in a place like this!
Where is my excellent Lord Leo? I ought to be by his side!
Your divine weapon's name is Breidablik? Oh, who am I kidding?! How cool is that!
All right!
OK!
So excited!
